overview: Tne documentary film Still Moving: Pilobolus at Forty, directed by Dartmouth professor Jeffrey Ruoff, celebrates Pilobolus by documenting their 40th anniversary performance event at Dartmouth College while also flashing back to the early years of the company through recollections, video, and photographs. Still Moving is an apt title because, as the documentary makes clear, 40 years is a long time for a dance company to exist, particularly one that was built and continues to thrive on collaboration.
title: Still Moving: Pilobolus at Forty
